document.full_text: spain's short-term borrowing costs jumped on tuesday as euro zone markets returned from the easter break still fretting about a potential greek debt restructuring with knock-on effects on other sovereigns.
document.title: spanish borrowing costs jump; greek debt shunned
lines_and_colors: spain's short-term borrowing costs jumped on tuesday as euro zone markets returned from the easter break still fretting about a potential greek debt restructuring with knock-on effects on other sovereigns.
